Replace.Text: Join another player's war against a target civilization.

Used to declare war on a player while you are in a Golden Age with a "To Arms!" Dedication. Can be used right after Denouncing a civilization, without waiting the normal amount of turns. No restrictions on which cities you may capture. Warmonger penalties reduced by 75%.
Used to declare war on a player who has broken a promise to you within the past 30 turns. No restrictions on which cities you may capture. Warmonger penalties reduced by 50%.
Used to declare war on a player who is in a different Tier 3 government. No restrictions on which cities you may capture. Warmonger penalties reduced by 50%.

Establish an Alliance with a Declared Friend. Allies may not go to war, automatically have Open Borders, automatically form a Defensive Pact, and each receives a Casus Belli on an aggressor civilization if one of their allies loses a city.
